description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3.   Fittest is a dual-analogue shooter in the same style as Geometry Wars.  It has multiple game modes, and many skins/music themes.  There is an emphasis on multiplayer games, with unique bosses designed to be beaten through cooperation between the number of players in the game.  The bosses encountered largely depend on the number of players in each game.  Online play is enabled.
